TEXT.English: Units can't move in 45* direction to the enemy unit. It is necessary to attack (0*), to go sideway (90*), or to retreat (135* and 180*). The exceptions are if the enemies are invisible, if there is a combat-capable unit or a friendly city on the tile, or if the block passes through the river and blocking units do not have the ability to attack without penalties across the river. It is not useful for animals.
